articles.title: Heathrow Airport: How Saudi Arabia May Ultimately Gain Control - Bloomberg
articles.description: Saudi Arabia may ultimately gain majority control of London Heathrow Airport, Europe’s busiest, as several shareholders consider the sale of their interests, the Times reported on Sunday.
